metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9636 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Python 2.7.x through 2.7.16 and 3.x through 3.7.2 is affected by: ImproperHandling of Unicode Encoding (with an incorrect netloc) during NFKCnormalization. The impact is: Information disclosure (credentials, cookies,etc. that are cached against a given hostname). The components are:urllib.parse.urlsplit, urllib.parse.urlparse. The attack vector is: Aspecially crafted URL could be incorrectly parsed to locate cookies orauthentication data and send that information to a different host than whenparsed correctly. This is fixed in: v2.7.17, v2.7.17rc1, v2.7.18,v2.7.18rc1; v3.5.10, v3.5.10rc1, v3.5.7, v3.5.8, v3.5.8rc1, v3.5.8rc2,v3.5.9; v3.6.10, v3.6.10rc1, v3.6.11, v3.6.11rc1, v3.6.12, v3.6.9,v3.6.9rc1; v3.7.3, v3.7.3rc1, v3.7.4, v3.7.4rc1, v3.7.4rc2, v3.7.5,v3.7.5rc1, v3.7.6, v3.7.6rc1, v3.7.7, v3.7.7rc1, v3.7.8, v3.7.8rc1, v3.7.9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9636` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python2.7 - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
libpython2.7 - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
python2.7 - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
python2.7-examples - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
python2.7-minimal - 2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

idle-python3.6 - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
libpython3.6 - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
libpython3.6-minimal - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
libpython3.6-stdlib - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
libpython3.6-testsuite - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
python3.6 - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
python3.6-examples - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
python3.6-minimal - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
python3.6-venv - 3.6.8-1~18.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

idle-python3.7 - 3.7.3~rc1-1
libpython3.7 - 3.7.3~rc1-1
libpython3.7-minimal - 3.7.3~rc1-1
libpython3.7-stdlib - 3.7.3~rc1-1
libpython3.7-testsuite - 3.7.3~rc1-1
python3.7 - 3.7.3~rc1-1
python3.7-examples - 3.7.3~rc1-1
python3.7-minimal - 3.7.3~rc1-1
python3.7-venv - 3.7.3~rc1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.15-4ubuntu4~18.04.1').
python3.6 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.8-1~18.04.2').
python3.7 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.3~rc1-1').
